short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time and money by automating repetitive tasks and extending websites your business relies on with a set of easy to use tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromane is a chrome extension which serves as a container for simple easy-to-use tools that can save you time and money by automating repetitive tasks and improving websites you often use.
